dcterms:creator: A. Shaban
S. Bansal

I. Essa
B. Boots
dcterms:description: PASCAL-5i is a dataset for few-shot segmentation, re-created from the data in PASCAL VOC 2012 and augmented with mask annotations. It contains 20 object classes and is split into 4 folds for training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: PASCAL-5i

dcterms:creator: T. Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona
D. Ramanan
P. Doll√°r
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: COCO-20i is a dataset for few-shot segmentation consisting of 80 object classes, split into 4 folds for training and evaluation. It is based on the Microsoft COCO dataset, which contains images of common objects in context.
dcterms:title: COCO-20i

dcterms:creator: X. Li
T. Wei
Y. P. Chen
Y. W. Tai
C. K. Tang
dcterms:description: FSS-1000 is a dataset designed for few-shot segmentation, containing 1,000 classes. It is split into 520 classes for training, 240 for validation, and 240 for testing.
dcterms:title: FSS-1000
